item.title: Day 5: (Part 2) Data, Data and More Data!
item.description: Collab link for numpy and pandas[link](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1f4DdhBsaVZ0BafAgMeZ5U_QWq-VK8ijL?usp=sharing ) Collab link for Data analytics [link](https://colab.research.google.com/drive/1Zp7JOOOAj2Hq_g9_NJm_5jye4SkIKI3F?usp=sharing ) Welcome to Data Analytics Data analytics is the science of analyzing raw data to make conclusions about that information. Five Step of Data Analytics Importing the required libraries import pandas as pd import json import plotly.express as px from urllib.request import urlopen Download the dataset from sf23-content Day_05 - Data Analytics !wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/locus-ioe/sf23-content/master/static/Day5/admission.csv Read the admission dataset downloaded before as pandas dataframe admission_df = pd.
